guildJoin.title: Thank you for using {{COM:bot.name}}!
description: To support the bot and unlock special features use `/premium` in your server.
To view the commands of this bow use `/help`.
To setup the bot run `/setup` in your server.
To set your birthday use `/set`.
View the {{COM:bot.name}} [Documentation]({{COM:links.docs}}) or [FAQ]({{COM:docLinks.faq}}).
For more support join the {{COM:bot.name}} support server [here]({{COM:links.support}})!

welcome.title: Thank you for using {{COM:bot.name}}!
description: {{REF:bot.description}}
[Kevin Novak](https://github.com/KevinNovak) has created a handy [map time zone picker]({{COM:links.map}})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then use it in the `/set` command.

support.description: For support join our discord server [here]({{COM:links.support}})!

translate.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Translations
translate.description: Thank you to our translators who have made it possible for {{COM:bot.name}} to be used in the following languages. If you are interested in providing a translation, please contact the staff in our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}).

birthday.title: {{REF:terms.birthdayList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Birthdays are celebrated on the day (and __time zone__) of the birthday user. To set your birthday use `{{REF:bot.prefix}} set`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversary.title: {{REF:terms.memberAnniversaryList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Member Anniversaries are celebrated on the day of the user's server join date (in the timezone of the __server__).*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

serverAnniversaryMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.serverAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random server anniversary message is chosen for each server anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

serverAnniversaryMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.serverAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random server anniversary message is chosen for each server anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificBirthdayMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.userBirthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificBirthdayMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.userBirthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificMemberAnniversaryMessageUnLo.title: {{REF:list.userMemberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific member anniversary message is a message sent on that member's member anniversary. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificMemberAnniversaryMessageLock.title: {{REF:list.userMemberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific member anniversary message is a message sent on that member's member anniversary. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} config` [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsTrustedRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRolePaid.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} config` [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsTrustedRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryRolesTitle}}
description: *A member anniversary role is a given to a user when they hit the given amount of years apart of a discord. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsAnniversaryRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryRolePaid.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryRolesTitle}}
description: *A member anniversary role is a given to a user when they hit the given amount of years apart of a discord. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsAnniversaryRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

blacklist.title: {{REF:terms.blacklistList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Users on this list or who have roles on this list will not have their birthdays celebrated no matter what. Edit this list with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist <{{REF:types.add}}/{{REF:types.remove}}> <User/Role>`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

premiumDisabled.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
premiumDisabled.description: Premium subscriptions are currently disabled. Enjoy premium features for free! Woohoo!

refuseNewTransactions.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
description: New subscriptions are not being accept at this time. Please try again later.
[Join Support Server]({{COM:links.support}})

premiumAlreadyActive.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
description: This server already has an active premium subscription or one that is currently processing.

You cannot purchase premium for this server at this time. If you've recently checked out, you may need for the payment to be processed. If the subscriptions was recently cancelled you may need to wait until the paid time runs out before re-subscribing. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.
[Join Support Server]({{COM:links.support}})

subscriptionDMPrompt.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
description: I have private messaged you with a PayPal subscription link!
If you did not receive a message, please make sure you have direct messages enabled for this server (under this servers Privacy Settings) and run this command again.

subscriptionPM.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
subscriptionPM.description: Complete your servers subscription by checking out with PayPal at the link below.

fields.name: Premium Features
value: - Up to **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom birthday messages *(vs **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom member anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom server anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Access to Member Anniversary Roles! (Up to {{MAX_ANNIVERSARY_ROLES}}!)
- Access to multiple Trusted Roles! (Up to {{MAX_TRUSTED_ROLES}}!)
- Access to user-specific custom birthday messages
- Customize the color **each** birthday message embed

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{COM:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

noSubscription.title: {{COM:bot.name}} Premium
noSubscription.description: Subscribe to **{{COM:bot.name}} Premium** to give this server extra features!

fields.name: Premium Features
value: - Up to **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom birthday messages *(vs **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom member anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom server anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Access to Member Anniversary Roles! (Up to {{MAX_ANNIVERSARY_ROLES}}!)
- Access to multiple Trusted Roles! (Up to {{MAX_TRUSTED_ROLES}}!)
- Access to user-specific custom birthday messages
- Customize the color **each** birthday message embed

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Type `/subscribe` to purchase a subscription. You will then be direct messaged a PayPal link where you can checkout using your PayPal account or credit card. Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{COM:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Type `/subscribe` to purchase a subscription. You will then be direct messaged a PayPal link where you can checkout using your PayPal account or credit card. Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{COM:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

footers.whyPremium: Premium helps us support and maintain the bot!
footers.joinSupport: Please join our support server if you have any questions.

defaults.memberAnniversaryMessage: Congratulations on {{REF:placeHolders.year}} year(s) in the server {{REF:placeHolders.users}}!

permissions.MENTION_EVERYONE: Mention Everyone, Here, and All Roles

list.birthdayMessageFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom birthday messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.memberAnniversaryMessageFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom member anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.serverAnniversaryMessageFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom server anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.userSpecificMessageFieldText: User-specific messages are a premium only feature. Unlock them with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.trustedRoleFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** trusted roles. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.memberAnniversaryRoleFieldText: Member anniversary roles are a premium feature **only**. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
